Package org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util

Class Summary
Bend A class that encapsulates the representation of the bend used for a particular PEdgeView.
ColorInterpolator  
Cubic This class represents a cubic polynomial data structure.
CubicGenerator A class to calculate the cubic spline curve based on input points.
PArrowIcon Draws an arrow icon at the target point.
PCircleIcon Draws a circle icon at the target node.
PDeltaIcon Draws an arrow icon at the target point.
PDiamondIcon Draws a diamond icon at the target node.
PEdgeEndIcon Base class that encapsulates some of the basic functionality needed to draw an icon.
PFishEye The idea of this fisheye lens is that it will zoom
PLabel The Label class for nodes and edges
PNamedHandle A little wrapper class that adds a name to a PHandle.
PNullIcon Draws a T icon at the target end of the edge.
PPointLocator A PNodeLocator that locates itself based on a known point.
PrintingFixTextNode This is a version of a Piccolo PText node that takes control of its own rendering behavior when printing.
PSmallBoundsHandle PSmallBoundsHandle a handle for resizing the bounds of another node.
PSmallHandle PSmallHandle is used to modify some aspect of Piccolo when it is dragged.
PTIcon Draws a T icon at the target end of the edge.
